title: Low fps from reset
body:
So recently I completely wiped my computer of all its files and i obviously had to reinstall league. Before the reset, I got around 100 fps on high settings and now i find myself getting around 30 fps. I have no idea how it's happening

Windows 10 Home
CPU: Intel Core i5-6200U CPU @ 2.30GHz 2.40GHz
GPU: NVIDIA GeFore 920M
RAM: 12GB
64 bit OS

replies.body: With a reinstall or reformat, you may need to to tune up your PC by updating your settings and drivers.  Start with our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help, which includes making sure your drivers are up to date.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Thanks for trying!  At this point, grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and obtain some logs to give us some more context.  Attach those logs into a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team will help you individually.  We'll reply back as soon we can!
